recipes.title: Plantain Nachos
recipes.description: Crispy plantain nachos made with ripe plantains, melted cheese, and fresh toppings. A perfect snack or party appetizer with a savory crunch.
ingredients: Sour cream or yogurt for topping
steps: Slice the plantains thinly and toss with olive oil and salt.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 15–20 minutes until crispy.
Remove from oven and top with shredded cheese and diced toppings.
Bake for 5 more minutes until the cheese melts.
Serve warm with a dollop of sour cream or yogurt.

recipes.title: Spicy Peanut Butter Popcorn
recipes.description: Spicy Peanut Butter Popcorn made with popcorn, peanut butter and honey. Perfect for movie nights and small snacks.
steps: Melt peanut butter, honey, and chili powder in a pot under low heat.
Pour over already cooked popcorn and mix evenly.

recipes.title: Savory French Toast Sticks
recipes.description: Savory French Toast Sticks made with bread, eggs, milk and grated cheese. Perfect for breakfast.
steps: Whisk eggs with milk, cheese, salt, pepper, and chili.
Dip sticks and fry until golden on each side.
Serve warm with grated cheese sprickled on it.
